title: Neenga Nalla Irukkonum Lyrics Idhayakkani
stanzas:
Neenga nalla irukkonum
naadu munnera.
indha naatil ulla
yaezhigalin vazhvu munnera(2)

endrum nallavanga ellorum
unga pinnaale.
nee nenaichathellaam
nadakkumunga
kannu munnaale (2)

Neenga nalla irukkonum
naadu munnera.
indha naatil ulla
yaezhigalin vazhvu munnera

uzhaikkum tholargale
ondru koodungal.
ulagam namadhu endru
sindhu paadungal (2)

maedu pallam illaatha
samuthaayam kaana
enna vazhi endru
enni paarungal.
annaa sonna vazhi
kandu nanmai thaedungal

neenga nallaa irukkonum
naadu munnera
indha naadengum illaamai
illai endraaga.

paadupattu sertha porulai
kodukkum podhum inbam.
naalum yaezhai malarndha
mugathai paarkkum podhum inbam.(2)

paeraasaiyaale vandha thunbam
suyanalathin pillai.
suyanalae irukkum nenjil
amaidhi endrum illai. (2)
amaidhi endrum illai.

kaatrum neerum
vaanum neruppum.
podhuvil irukkuthu.
manithan kaalil patta
boomi mattum
pirinthu kidakkuthu. (2)

pirithu vaithu paarpathellaam
manitha idhayame.(2)
ulagil pirivu maari
orumai vandhaal
amaidhi nilavume.
amaidhi  nilavume.

Neenga nalla irukkonum
naadu munnera.
indha naatil ulla
yaezhigalin vazhvu munnera

nadhiyai pola
naamum  nadandhu
payanthara vendum.
kadalai pole
virindha idhayam
irundhida vendum.
vaanam pola pirarukkaaga
azhuthida vendum

vazhum vazhkai ulagil
endrum vilangida vendum.
endrum vilangida vendum.

Neenga nalla irukkonum
naadu munnera.
indha naatil ulla
yaezhigalin vazhvu munnera(2)
